availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George W. Grimes (Henry County, Kentucky, farmer and grocery)

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, farmer and grocery keeper. Virginia native. Married to Susan Shivart Grimes. Father of Allen R. Grimes, Samuel E. Grimes, Celinda N. Grimes, and Margaret M. Grimes. Married to Melinda H. Grimes. Father of C.W. Grimes. Farmer in Henry County, Kentucky, in 1850. Grocery keeper in Henry County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, District 1, p. 374A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Subdivision 1, p. 36.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Subdivision, p. 10.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994038, Henry County Births, p. 4.
